alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Lincoln; Natchitoches; Red River; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 10:03PM CDT until April 12 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Eastern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1003 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bossier City to 8 miles southeast of Logansport, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Coushatta, Ringgold, Campti, Heflin, Martin, South Mansfield, Hall Summit, Saline, Lucky, Ashland, Castor, Edgefield, Bienville, Jamestown, Powhatan, Bryceland, Mount Lebanon, Carmel and Lake End. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Lincoln; Natchitoches; Red River; Webster
